welcome_message_body: "Welcome to New Berlin, a charming city known for its rich history and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories here in New Berlin."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lawrence J Timmerman Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lawrence J Timmerman Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at General Mitchell International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C is a satellite terminal connected to the main terminal, serving mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: Concourse D is a satellite terminal connected to the main terminal, serving mainly international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at West Bend Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at West Bend Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
